CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, pg. 21 reads: "...2. Miss Marcella Palmer and Mrs. Myrtle Stewart pass out TUMS samples to visitors...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Marcella Palmer and Myrtle Stewart distributing Tums to audience in the Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
